actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Taylor Grazing Act of 1934 to clarify the power and responsibilities of the Secretary of the Interior in the approval of State selections of indemnity lands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Indemnity Lands Act of 1980 - Amends the Taylor Grazing Act of 1934 to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from disapproving a State's selection of specified indemnity lands as a substitute for such State's lost school sections when the selected lands are more valuable than the sections they are intended to replace.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Taylor Grazing Act of 1934 to clarify the power and responsibilities of the Secretary of the Interior in the approval of State selections of indemnity lands, and for other purposes.
